articles.title: ‘Chinese Jokic’ Yang Hansen selected at 16th pick in NBA draft, day before 20th birthday
articles.summary: Chinese basketball star Yang Hansen turned 20 on Thursday, but the best birthday gift he could ask for arrived a day earlier: putting on the NBA...
articles.content: Chinese basketball star Yang Hansen turned 20 on Thursday, but the best birthday gift he could ask for arrived a day earlier: putting on the NBA draft cap after being picked in the first round.
